data.title: Saiva Camping in Vilhelmina, Västerbotten
data.meta_description: Camping in Lapland by Vildmarksvägen. Lakeside and child-friendly campsite with 23 camping cabins, 55 caravan sites and 2 service houses.
data.text: Saiva Camping is beautifully situated by the lake Baksjön at the edge of Vilhelmina, about 1 kilometre from the centre of town. Facilities include a reception building, service building, 23 cabins and 55 RV sites. The reception building has a souvenir shop, a café and a lounge area with TV, fireplace and couches where you can relax or enjoy a snack. The service building includes shower/toilet, kitchen, laundry room, latrin and dump station. We have cabins that range in price from SEK 350 to 1390/per night. For more information about accomodation please click here. If you are planning a holiday in Lapland, we would be pleased to be your host!
